EnExplanation: The verb 'õelda' in Estonian means to express something verbally or to convey information through speech.

Samples.EeSentence: Ma tahan sulle midagi head õelda.
Samples.EnSentence: I want to say something nice to you.

Samples.EeSentence: Ma tahan sulle midagi head öelda.
Samples.EnSentence: I want to say something nice to you.
